front.title: •General McQuarrie
front.gametext: While McQuarrie is on Hoth, your Hoth Sentry is not unique (•), is doubled, deploys free, applies all of its modifiers and is immune to Alter. Power -1 when not on Hoth.
front.lore: Commander from Ralltiir. Fled from his homeworld after its occupation by the Empire. Was instrumental in the establishment of the new Rebel base on Hoth.

rulings: Increases the typical '4 ability' requirement for drawing battle destiny.
Also increases any special requirements such as on A Jedi's Strength.
